There is no cruelty so bad as that which springs from the conscience, no eye so pitiless to the man in the flame as that which sees God setting light to the faggot. If we realised that Jesus went about converting hearts, solely, as far as his own will was concerned, by the discipline of joy, we shall have a truer test for our own motives ; for at times when great gladness befalls those to whom we feel opposed, we can ask ourselves whether we are 35 heartily glad that God is giving them that sort of opportunity 35 if he had sent grief.
